item.title: Extremely Basic Chat Server (1 File, no features)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:305237"][quote author=demonnd link=topic=398341.msg2974695#msg2974695 date=1254186191]
here is what i made outa it (its not done) ive added some stuff it should be able to run with irc now but you cant talk yet god idk lol[code]import java.io.BufferedOutputStream;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.util.ArrayList;

/*
*
*
*
@author AMERICA
@edited by demonnd
*
@about Basic chat server
*
@about Use irc to connect, and chat
*/

public class ChatServer implements Runnable {

public static ArrayList<Socket> clients = new ArrayList<Socket>();
public static final int maxusers = 200;
public static Player USER[] = new Player[maxusers];
public static String usersCurrentlyOn[] = new String[maxusers];
public Socket client;
public Socket NICK;
public int mute = 0;
public int Rights = 0;
public static String alert = "";
public BufferedReader in;

public ChatServer(Socket sock) throws IOException {

    client = sock;
    in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(client.getInputStream()));
}

public void run() {
   try {

while (client.isConnected()) {
String x = null;
if ((x = in.readLine()) != null) {
System.out.println(x);
sendMsg(x);
}
}
clients.remove(client);
} catch (Exception ex) {
ex.printStackTrace();
}
if (Rights == 3)
{
alert = “Owner " + NICK + " has logged in”;
}
else if (Rights == 2)
{
alert = “Server Administrator " + NICK + " has logged in”;
}
else if (Rights == 1)
{
alert = “Moderator " + NICK + " has logged in”;
}
else if (Rights == 0)
{
alert = NICK+ " has logged in";
}
}

public static int getPlayerID(String playerName) {
    for (int i = 0; i < maxusers; i++) {
        if (usersCurrentlyOn[i] != null) {
            if (usersCurrentlyOn[i].equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)) {
                return i;
            }
        }
    }
    return -1;
}

public void Rights(String Rights) {

}
public void customCommand(String command) throws IOException {

         if (command.startsWith("mute") && Rights >= 1) {
        try {
            String victim = command.substring(8);

            int p = getPlayerID(name);
            ChatServer c = USER[p];
            c.mute = 1;
            alert = "MOD " + NICK + " is muting " + victim;
            sendMsg("Player " + victim + " successfully muted");
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
            sendMsg("name dosn't exist");
        }
}

}

public void sendMsg(String msg) throws IOException {

    for (Socket s : clients) {
    if (mute == 1) {
         sendMsg("you are muted and can not speak");
        }else if (s != client) {
            OutputStreamWriter out = new OutputStreamWriter(new BufferedOutputStream(s.getOutputStream()));
            out.write(msg + "\r\n");
            out.flush();
        }
    }
}

public static void main(String[] args) {

    try {
        ServerSocket serv = new ServerSocket(43593);
        while (true) {
            Socket s = serv.accept();
            clients.add(s);
            (new Thread(new ChatServer(s))).start();
        }
    } catch (Exception ex) {
        ex.printStackTrace();
    }
}

}//edited by demonnd[/code]
not very impresive just basic shit yes it has 2 errors but im bored lol
im going to make it awsome too
[/quote]
How the hell do you expect that to actually work?[/quote]
yur stupd

Seriously. Stop putting others down when you’re an idiot who knows almost nothing. Seriously.

Read full topic

[/quote]

item.title: Extremely Basic Chat Server (1 File, no features)
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

here is what i made outa it (its not done) ive added some stuff it should be able to run with irc now but you cant talk yet god idk lol[code]import java.io.BufferedOutputStream;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
import java.net.ServerSocket;
import java.net.Socket;
import java.util.ArrayList;

/*
*
*
*
@author AMERICA
@edited by demonnd
*
@about Basic chat server
*
@about Use irc to connect, and chat
*/

public class ChatServer implements Runnable {

public static ArrayList<Socket> clients = new ArrayList<Socket>();
public static final int maxusers = 200;
public static Player USER[] = new Player[maxusers];
public static String usersCurrentlyOn[] = new String[maxusers];
public Socket client;
public Socket NICK;
public int mute = 0;
public int Rights = 0;
public static String alert = "";
public BufferedReader in;

public ChatServer(Socket sock) throws IOException {

    client = sock;
    in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(client.getInputStream()));
}

public void run() {
   try {

while (client.isConnected()) {
String x = null;
if ((x = in.readLine()) != null) {
System.out.println(x);
sendMsg(x);
}
}
clients.remove(client);
} catch (Exception ex) {
ex.printStackTrace();
}
if (Rights == 3)
{
alert = “Owner " + NICK + " has logged in”;
}
else if (Rights == 2)
{
alert = “Server Administrator " + NICK + " has logged in”;
}
else if (Rights == 1)
{
alert = “Moderator " + NICK + " has logged in”;
}
else if (Rights == 0)
{
alert = NICK+ " has logged in";
}
}

public static int getPlayerID(String playerName) {
    for (int i = 0; i < maxusers; i++) {
        if (usersCurrentlyOn[i] != null) {
            if (usersCurrentlyOn[i].equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)) {
                return i;
            }
        }
    }
    return -1;
}

public void Rights(String Rights) {

}
public void customCommand(String command) throws IOException {

         if (command.startsWith("mute") && Rights >= 1) {
        try {
            String victim = command.substring(8);

            int p = getPlayerID(name);
            ChatServer c = USER[p];
            c.mute = 1;
            alert = "MOD " + NICK + " is muting " + victim;
            sendMsg("Player " + victim + " successfully muted");
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
            sendMsg("name dosn't exist");
        }
}

}

public void sendMsg(String msg) throws IOException {

    for (Socket s : clients) {
    if (mute == 1) {
         sendMsg("you are muted and can not speak");
        }else if (s != client) {
            OutputStreamWriter out = new OutputStreamWriter(new BufferedOutputStream(s.getOutputStream()));
            out.write(msg + "\r\n");
            out.flush();
        }
    }
}

public static void main(String[] args) {

    try {
        ServerSocket serv = new ServerSocket(43593);
        while (true) {
            Socket s = serv.accept();
            clients.add(s);
            (new Thread(new ChatServer(s))).start();
        }
    } catch (Exception ex) {
        ex.printStackTrace();
    }
}

}//edited by demonnd[/code]
not very impresive just basic shit yes it has 2 errors but im bored lol
im going to make it awsome too
